data.actual_result: They start to flash and choose other options despite where you clicked
data.expected_result: They are supposed to get selected each time you select the desired one
data.short_description: In the server members prune modal, clicking many times between the 3 options causes them to flash between each other
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server - Go to server settings - Click members - Click the red button "prune" - Click between the 3 options multiple times randomly - Observe
